features.title: Free Weights Area

features.title: Cardio Zone
features.description: Treadmills and ellipticals for high-intensity cardiovascular workouts.

features.description: Kettlebells, TRX, and plyometric equipment for versatile routines.

features.title: Squat Racks
features.description: Space for barbell squats, presses, and heavy compound lifts.

features.title: Machine Circuit
features.description: Isolated machines ideal for beginners or focused muscle work.

features.title: Stretching Area
features.description: Comfortable mats and tools for flexibility and mobility.

features.title: Spinning Room
features.description: Energetic cycling classes with upbeat music and instructors.

features.title: Boxing Zone

features.title: Pilates Studio

features.title: CrossFit Rig
features.description: Bars, rings, and rigs tailored for advanced CrossFit routines.

features.title: Locker Rooms

features.title: Reception Area

features.title: Hydration Station
